title.description: Title by which a person is addressed

forename.comments: Alphanumeric no consecutive spaces (i.e. a space can not appear adjacent to another space).

forename2.description: The second given name of a person, e.g. Ian

forename3.description: The third given name of a person, e.g. Barry

surname.description: Surname or Family name, e.g. Brown (CJS DSC v5 3.39 Family Name)
surname.comments: Alphanumeric no consecutive spaces (i.e. a space can not appear adjacent to another space).
